Collapse

A kinetic roguelike created for LOWRESJAM 2022. 

Story

Climate change has melted the ice caps and sea levels are rising. You are a hermit who lives on a mountain top that has gradually become an island. Seek salvation in the depths below, for yourself, and everyone else. 

How to play

Move around the map and bump into monsters and items to interact. Watch enemies for movement patterns and look for an opportunity to STRIKE. 

Controls

-Arrows/WASD - Move 

-E - Use

-Q - Skip turn
